Name: Cookie Store
About the game: Welcome to the Cookie Store! Would you be interested in a cute, happy, and colorful life as a cafe owner? You can find it in this Visual Novel! Please take a look at our menu below. Menu: get closer to your employees and friends - 6 different character routes three possible endings of the main story - but the game will not end there... uplifting music and colorful art - partially animated characters - 14 illustrations and characters gallery to unlock test your skills and... luck - simple minigame simulating financial progress (tutorial included) Full course might take about 3 hours or more (all routes, depending on reading speed and time in minigames)
Meta Title: Cookie Store: Nov 9, 2020, Mikołaj Spychał and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Cookie Store? Check out the release date (Nov 9, 2020), developer insights from Mikołaj Spychał, and a complete game summary.
